titles.title: National Park System Donor Acknowledgment Act of 2014
National Park System Donor Acknowledgment Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acknowledge contributions at units of the National Park System.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Landrieu with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 113-301.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 641.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
